description.profile2: Yashiro acts as a writer, composer and movie director.
description.profile3: As a philosopher, he studied German philosophy at university of Tsukuba and Analytic philosophy at university of Cologne.
description.profile4: He's currently working as a programmer in Tokyo.

philosophy.utilitarianism_des: I seek to produce the greatest happiness of the greatest number based on Utilitarianism.
philosophy.empiricism_sub: Believe the sense and the analysis.
philosophy.empiricism_des: I seek human knowledge from the analysis about human sense, instead of a-priori recognition.
philosophy.atheism_des: I believe only the facts which can be handled quantitatively and testable.

creator.write_des1: I'be written novels and essays since 10 yeas ago.
creator.write_des2: I got North Asia University Literature Award with 'Oritatamigasa' and 'Saigono-Kansyasai'.
creator.write_des3: You can see my works at my blog(link).
creator.music_des1: I enjoyed Chorus and Ocarina when I was teenager.
creator.music_des2: At twenty years old, I started to sing with a guitar. I also plan Open-Mic events.
creator.music_des3: Now I'm composing main songs and sound tracks of my movie with DTM.
creator.movie_des2: Since 2014, I've making long movies with Studio-seginus.
creator.movie_des3: I've present two latest filmes in September 2019.
creator.movie_detail: You can see details at Studio-seginus HP.

skill.sub: I work as an Information Engineer. I prove my skills especially in Informatics and Electrical science.
skill.seginus: I joined starting business as a designer.
skill.hirate: I worked at design company as a control engineer.
skill.eight: I'm now working at IT company as a programmer.
